footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies at this time. Check back soon!
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred psychoactive brew from the Amazon, traditionally used for spiritual and healing purposes. It is prepared by combining the leaves of the Psychotria viridis shrub with the stalks of the Banisteriopsis caapi vine.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The brew induces altered states of consciousness, leading to introspection, psychological insights, and spiritual experiences. The effects can last for several hours, guiding participants on a profound inner journey.
spiritualMasterDescription: As a plant teacher, Ayahuasca is revered for its ability to provide profound wisdom and guidance. It teaches through visions, emotions, and deep connections, helping to resolve internal conflicts and illuminate one's life path.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many report a significant reduction in mental clutter, gaining new perspectives on personal issues and life direction.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: The experience can facilitate the release of repressed emotions and traumas, leading to deep emotional healing and release.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Participants often feel a stronger connection to themselves, others, and the universe, fostering a sense of unity and purpose.
groupCeremonyDescription: Participating in a group amplifies the collective energy, creating a supportive environment where shared experiences deepen the individual journey.
privateCeremonyDescription: A private session offers a more intimate and personalized experience, tailored to your specific intentions and healing needs.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn more about the sacred Ayahuasca brew, its origins, effects, and the profound healing it can offer.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced guides who will support you on your journey, providing a safe and compassionate space for transformation.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a meaningful experience. Find out how to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for the ceremony.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social networks to stay connected, receive updates on our next ceremonies, and be part of our healing community.
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your journey with us.
googleSuccessDescription: Welcome! You are now logged in.
registerSubtext: Start your healing journey with us today.
registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been created. Welcome!
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to access exclusive content, reserve your spot in our ceremonies, and track your healing process.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the compassionate and experienced guides who will accompany you on your healing journey. Each of our guides is deeply committed to creating a safe, respectful, and supportive space for your transformation.
guide_desc_wilson_alfaro: Spiritual guide with a deep connection to Amazonian traditions. Trained in the Peruvian Amazon, Wilson Alfaro brings an ancestral understanding of Ayahuasca and its healing power. His experience facilitates a safe and trustworthy space for personal exploration.
guide_desc_jacob: Spiritual master trained in the Peruvian Amazon, where he learned the sacred use of ancestral medicine directly from healers. With a serene and profound presence, he guides ceremonies at Casa Trinitos (Guanacaste), where he accompanies transformation processes.
guide_desc_harley: Specialist in medical care and first aid, with experience in guided meditations and therapeutic massages. Her calm and professional presence ensures a safe environment throughout the ceremony, providing confidence and support to both the team and the participants.
guide_desc_johanna: Guardian of the medicine trained in the Peruvian Amazon. Providing ceremonies in Colombia and Costa Rica, her presence brings security, support, and balance between the physical and spiritual, upholding the ceremonial space with firmness, care, and a deep connection to female healing.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore all our upcoming and past events. Each ceremony is a unique opportunity for healing and self-discovery.
editCeremonyDescription: Update the details for this ceremony.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. You can still edit it later.
ceremonyMovedToPast: The ceremony has been moved to past events.
errorFinishingCeremony: Could not mark ceremony as finished.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will hide the ceremony from the main lists but it will not be deleted.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the guide's profile.
editHeroVideoDescription: Change the main video on the homepage by providing a new URL or uploading a file.
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please select a video file or enter a URL.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
themeTabDescription: Customize the color scheme for light and dark modes.
themeUpdateReload: The page will now reload to apply the changes.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review past conversations with the Spiritual Guide.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the full chat history.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users.
allUsersDescription: A list of all users in the system.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! We invite you to complete our brief health questionnaire to prepare for your ceremony with El Arte de Sanar. You can fill it out here:
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
emailBodyPlaceholder: Dear user, we would like to inform you that...
noAnswersSubmitted: This user has not submitted the questionnaire yet.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the form. You can review your answers below.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer the following questions honestly. This information is confidential and will only be used to ensure a safe experience.
errorRequiredDetails: Details are required if you answered 'Yes'.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, epilepsy)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any prescription medication?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list all medications and dosages.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please specify your mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with psychoactive substances or plant medicines?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: Please briefly describe your previous experiences.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to achieve or heal...
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your information has been saved securely.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
dialogSuccessDescription: Your answers have been submitted. The next step is to review the preparation guide for the ceremony.
preparationProcessDescription: Weeks before, focus on a clean diet and clear intentions.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The sacred ritual where you connect with the medicine.
experienceProcessDescription: The profound inner journey of healing and insight.
integrationProcessDescription: Weeks after, reflect and apply the lessons learned.
dietSubtitle: A clean diet purifies the body and sensitizes the spirit, allowing for a deeper connection with the medicine. It's recommended to start at least 3-7 days before the ceremony.
allowedFoodsList: Lean poultry and fish (if not vegetarian)
Herbal teas and plenty of water
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mindset is as important as your physical state. Cultivate a calm and open heart.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and center your energy.
intentionsDescription: Clearly define what you wish to heal, understand, or release during the ceremony.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes to gain clarity before the journey.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony may bring up deep-seated emotions. The key is to surrender, trust the process, and allow the medicine to guide you. Our team is here to support you in a space of non-judgment and compassion. Be open to whatever arises, as it is part of your healing path.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Come prepared to be comfortable and focused during your experience.
comfortItemsList: Comfortable, layered clothing (white or light colors recommended)
A blanket and a pillow or mat
A notebook and pen for journaling
essentialsList: A flashlight (with red light if possible)
Your personal intention for the ceremony
chatbotWelcome: Welcome! I am the Spiritual Guide. How can I assist you on your healing journey today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
